title: Chickenlover
role: out in front of the school.

title: Chickenlover
text: Okay, children. Each of you gets to choose two books from the booktastic bus.

title: Chickenlover
text: Reading sucks ass.

title: Chickenlover
text: Eric! Shut up!

title: Chickenlover
role: The boys are looking at a wide selection of books that adorn
text: the shelves of the bookmobile.

title: Chickenlover
text: Boring... Boring... Gay... Boring... Boring.

title: Chickenlover
role: Stan digs at the front of the bookmobile.

title: Chickenlover
text: Hey you guys, check out these books.

title: Chickenlover
text: (reading the cover) 'Sabrina Unchained'.

title: Chickenlover
role: The boys all grab books in the Sabrina series.

title: Chickenlover
text: Wow, these books look cool!

title: Chickenlover
role: The boys open them. Their eyes grow wide.

title: Chickenlover
text: (Flipping through) Hey, there's a lot of big words in these books!

title: Chickenlover
text: Mrm pr mpm rpm rpmrp!

title: Chickenlover
role: Just then the Bookmobile driver, a fruity little guy wearing
text: a rainbow shirt, notices them.

title: Chickenlover
text: Hello kids! I see you're discovering the magic of reading!

title: Chickenlover
text: Who are you?

title: Chickenlover
text: I drive the booktastic bus! Where magic begins! You see, reading opens up whole new worlds to you. You can take a canoe down the Amazon, or go back in time to Camelot, or become a race car driver... all by just opening a book. Just like magic! The magic of reading!

title: Chickenlover
text: God, shut up, dude.

title: Chickenlover
text: Go ahead and pick any books you like. Then give in... Give in to the magic!

title: Chickenlover
text: If we read are we gonna become like that guy?

title: Chickenlover
text: Yeah, this is stupid. Books aren't magical.

title: Chickenlover
text: I don't know, I'm kind of getting a tingly feeling looking at these...

title: Chickenlover
role: Cartman is looking at Sabrina Unchained.

title: Chickenlover
role: The boys hear some commotion from across the street. It's a
text: loud, screaming chicken, followed by some screams.

title: Chickenlover
text: Mph mmph?

title: Chickenlover
text: I don't know. Let's go see.

title: Chickenlover
role: Barbrady is driving in his car as a COPS film crew shoots
text: him. Everything is shot in COPS style. A TITLE at the bottom reads 'Officer Barbrady South Park P.D.'

title: Chickenlover
text: Well, being an officer of the peace means a lot of things. It's a hard job, but then again, I'm a hard man. A lot of people think that in a small town there isn't a lot for the law to do, well, they're wrong.

title: Chickenlover
text: All units, all units, report to 254 Avenue De Los Mexicanos.

title: Chickenlover
text: ...Possible hostile situation.

title: Chickenlover
role: Barbrady throws on his lights and speeds away.

title: Chickenlover
text: There! You see! This could be a bank robbery! Or possibly even a MURDER! This ain't no podunk little town!

title: Chickenlover
text: And Barbrady, your wife called she wants you to get some pizza on the way home.

title: Chickenlover
text: God dammit!

title: Chickenlover
role: The boys have already joined an angry crowd that has gathered
text: around a chicken cage.

title: Chickenlover
role: Barbrady pulls up in his car, followed by the COPS camera
text: crew.

title: Chickenlover
text: Okay people, move along! There's nothing to see here!

title: Chickenlover
role: Barbrady gets up to the rancher.

title: Chickenlover
text: What's the trouble? Where's the body?!

title: Chickenlover
text: Barbrady! I just caught some guy in here having sex with one of my chickens!!

title: Chickenlover
role: Barbrady looks kind of embarrassed. He glances at the cops
text: crew.

title: Chickenlover
text: Uh... Oh.

title: Chickenlover
role: The Rancher points to the cage. Inside, is a normal looking
text: chicken, eating some feed.

title: Chickenlover
text: My God! That's disgusting!

title: Chickenlover
text: Whoa dude! How do you have sex with a chicken!

title: Chickenlover
text: Boys! You move along, this isn't for young eyes to see!

title: Chickenlover
text: Did you get a good look at the suspect?

title: Chickenlover
text: Naw I didn't see anything! It just happened so fast.

title: Chickenlover
role: The COPS crew roll their eyes.

title: Chickenlover
text: Well, this is quite interesting, huh guys?

title: Chickenlover
text: Uhh, we're gonna go grab some lunch and maybe get some shots of those turtles down at the pond.

title: Chickenlover
role: The Cops crew walks away. Barbrady is bummed.

title: Chickenlover
text: Aw, camel poo.

title: Chickenlover
text: Hey, what's this?

title: Chickenlover
role: Kyle picks up a piece of paper off the ground.

title: Chickenlover
text: It look's like a note.

title: Chickenlover
text: (grabbing the note) Give me that! That's a clue and you'll get your stinky DNA all over it!

title: Chickenlover
text: What does it say?

title: Chickenlover
role: Over Barbrady's shoulder, we can see that it reads:

title: Chickenlover
role: Barbrady looks at the note and studies it for a second. He
text: appears to have trouble focusing on it.

title: Chickenlover
text: Uh... it says... Uh... Sorry I had sex with a chicken, I won't do it again. Bye-bye."

title: Chickenlover
role: Barbrady folds the note and puts it away.

title: Chickenlover
text: Well, there you have it. Case closed.

title: Chickenlover
text: Damnit Barbrady, what the hell's wrong with you? Every time something happens in this town you say, 'nothing to see here', and 'case closed'. But we want justice! We have to find this sick-o.

title: Chickenlover
text: I said return to you homes! Before I start arresting people!

title: Chickenlover
text: For what? ORDERLY conduct!

title: Chickenlover
text: How about fishing without a license?

title: Chickenlover
text: I'm not fishing!!!

title: Chickenlover
text: What do you call this then?

title: Chickenlover
role: Barbrady pulls out a fishing pole from behind him.

title: Chickenlover
text: If you do not comply, I'll be forced to execute each and every one of you by gunshot to the head!!!

title: Chickenlover
role: The crowd disperses, one by one.

title: Chickenlover
text: That's right, return to your simple lives, just forget this ever happened. Forget... FOR-GET...

title: Chickenlover
role: Finally everyone but the boys is gone, and Barbrady walks
text: off.

title: Chickenlover
text: Wow... Barbrady sure is acting weird.

title: Chickenlover
text: Yeah, I wonder what's wrong.

title: Chickenlover
role: Barbrady get's in the front seat and slams the door behind
text: him.

title: Chickenlover
role: We see his point of view as he looks at the note found on
text: the ground.

title: Chickenlover
role: Barbrady sighs deeply, then crumples up the note and speeds
text: off.

title: Chickenlover
role: Barbrady pulls up to a familiar red Stop sign. He looks at
text: it. It has Klingon letters on it.

title: Chickenlover
role: Barbrady pulls up to the speaker.

title: Chickenlover
text: Welcome to Fran's. Can I help you?

title: Chickenlover
role: Barbrady looks at the menu. From his POV, the letters seem
text: to be twisting and turning incoherently. They don't make any sense.

title: Chickenlover
text: Sir, can I help you?

title: Chickenlover
role: The letters come to life, they seem to laugh at Barbrady.

title: Chickenlover
text: Uh... Just give me two cheeseburgers and some jalapeno poppers.

title: Chickenlover
text: Sure, there's just one problem.

title: Chickenlover
text: What's that?

title: Chickenlover
text: We're a bank.

title: Chickenlover
role: Sure enough, right on top of the speaker is a sign that says
text: in big letters "Fran's National Bank".

title: Chickenlover
text: I know that, smarty-pants! What, do you think I'm some kind of idiot?

title: Chickenlover
text: Yes.

title: Chickenlover
text: Hmm.

title: Chickenlover
text: I can't go on living this lie!

title: Chickenlover
role: A graphic of scared chickens is beside the anchor's head.

title: Chickenlover
text: With chicken after chicken being violated, the South Park police are under increasing pressure to solve the case of the chickenfucker. We now go live to a press conference where Officer Barbrady and the Mayor are fielding questions --

title: Chickenlover
role: Barbrady stands behind a podium with mics in his face.

title: Chickenlover
text: Officer Barbrady, what would drive a man to such a disgusting act?

title: Chickenlover
text: Well, nobody can say for sure. No motive has yet been established.

title: Chickenlover
text: Do the police have any leads?

title: Chickenlover
text: Well, both 3-D computer modelling and intensive seismology have not given us any leads as of yet.

title: Chickenlover
text: But has chickenfucker left any clues at the crime -- ?

title: Chickenlover
text: ALRIGHT! ALRIGHT! I CAN'T READ!!!

title: Chickenlover
role: Silence. Barbrady's voice reverberates for a second. Everyone
text: else stands in shock.

title: Chickenlover
text: There I said it! I can't read! Are you happy now? You pushed and you pushed and now you all know my terrible secret!! I'm illegitimate!! I'M NOT FIT TO BE A POLICEMAN!! I RETIRE!!!

title: Chickenlover
role: Barbrady storms off Silence. Nobody says anything.

title: Chickenlover
text: Okay, thank you all for coming. There's coffee and brownies out front.

title: Chickenlover
text: And so, Officer Barbrady has taken a leave of absence. And South Park will have to manage without any police force for a while --

title: Chickenlover
role: A brick suddenly lands on the anchor's desk. He reads off
text: it.

title: Chickenlover
text: -- This just in! South Park has just plunged into TOTAL ANARCHY!! Exactly 2 seconds after the retirement of Officer Barbrady, looting and pillaging erupted in the quiet mountain town!

title: Chickenlover
role: Once again the town is being destroyed. Only this time, it
text: is by the citizens themselves. Buildings are on fire. Women and men booze it up. Cars crash into buildings.

title: Chickenlover
text: Whoopeee! This is killer!!

title: Chickenlover
text: With no cops around, we can do whatever we want!

title: Chickenlover
role: The boys are watching the South Park riots from across the
text: street.

title: Chickenlover
text: Woa, dude, what's going on?

title: Chickenlover
text: I don't know.

title: Chickenlover
role: Some random people overturn a car. It lands on top of Kenny.

title: Chickenlover
text: OH MY GOD!! THEY'VE KILLED --

title: Chickenlover
role: But then, the overturned car door opens, and Kenny walks
text: out, brushing himself off.

title: Chickenlover
text: Oh, never mind.

title: Chickenlover
role: The mayor is looking out the window at the chaos.

title: Chickenlover
text: I don't believe it... All this time Barbrady actually did keep this town peaceful.

title: Chickenlover
text: Who knew? I always thought he was a complete idiot...

title: Chickenlover
text: He is...

title: Chickenlover
role: Suddenly, all the reporters break into the Mayor's office.

title: Chickenlover
text: Mayor! What do you plan to do about the South Park riots?

title: Chickenlover
text: (holding up her hands) No reason for concern. I want to assure all of you -- that Officer Barbrady is STILL our active police force.

title: Chickenlover
text: But he's illiterate. What do you plan to do?

title: Chickenlover
text: Uh, plan? I don't actually --

title: Chickenlover
role: The Mayor's assistant pops in frame and answers for her.

title: Chickenlover
text: Reading classes. Plain and simple. By the Mayor's order, Officer Barbrady is on a temporary leave of absence to learn to read. Effective immediately.

title: Chickenlover
text: Yes, that's right. It's back to school with Officer Barbrady!

title: Chickenlover
role: Garrison stands at the head of the class.

title: Chickenlover
text: Now children, we have a new student joining us today. Please say hi to Officer Barbrady.

title: Chickenlover
role: Barbrady is sitting in the middle of the kids, sticking out
text: like a sore thumb.

title: Chickenlover
text: (Behind Barbrady) I can't see, dude!

title: Chickenlover
text: Okay, now since our focus has been on reading, let's review some of the basics.

title: Chickenlover
text: Yes, what is it?

title: Chickenlover
text: I need to go poopies.

title: Chickenlover
text: Officer Barbrady, in school we go to the bathroom before and after class.

title: Chickenlover
text: Oh, Christ. How do you kids do it?!

title: Chickenlover
text: Now, does anyone have any suggestions where we should begin with Officer Barbrady?

title: Chickenlover
text: How about a brain transplant?

title: Chickenlover
text: Now Kyle, let's be supportive of our new student give him the nurturing environment he needs to thrive. Now, I'm going to write a sentence, and I want us all to help Officer Barbrady read it.

title: Chickenlover
role: Garrison writes a sentence on the blackboard; 'Oprah Winfrey
text: has huge knockers.'

title: Chickenlover
text: Give it a shot, Officer Barbrady.

title: Chickenlover
text: BZZZT!!! WRONG!! Try again, dumbass!!

title: Chickenlover
role: Garrison slaps his knee and laughs.

title: Chickenlover
text: (drying his eyes) Okay, okay... Maybe we should try something a little easier. We can work our way up to the hard ones --

title: Chickenlover
role: He writes 'The hat is red.' on the board.

title: Chickenlover
text: Go ahead, Barbrady. Don't be scared.

title: Chickenlover
text: BZZZZZ!!!!! DER!! DID YOU HEAR THAT MR. HAT?!!!

title: Chickenlover
text: I SURE DID MR. GARRISON!!! WHAT A RETARD!!!

title: Chickenlover
role: Garrison laughs so hard he falls on the floor. He just laughs
text: and laughs and laughs.

title: Chickenlover
text: Did you kids actually learn how to read this way?

title: Chickenlover
text: No, we just fake it to shut him up.

title: Chickenlover
role: Garrison is up at the front, still laughing and tearing up.

title: Chickenlover
text: Okay, okay, I'm sorry... I'm sorry..Let's try again...

title: Chickenlover
role: Three chickens are in their coop, bawking quietly.

title: Chickenlover
role: Then, a human shadow falls over the chickens as the door the
text: coop opens. The chickens look over and rustle their feathers.

title: Chickenlover
text: Say... What are nice chickens like you doing in a coop like this?

title: Chickenlover
role: The kids and Barbrady sit in their desks.

title: Chickenlover
text: Now children, I hope you all had a good time reading your books, and are prepared for your book reports.

title: Chickenlover
text: Who should we have go first, Mr. Hat? Let's see...

title: Chickenlover
text: (Throwing his voice) Oh, how about Stan? Or Kyle?

title: Chickenlover
text: Eric, why don't you go first.

title: Chickenlover
text: Ooh...

title: Chickenlover
text: What's the matter, Eric? Are you not prepared again?

title: Chickenlover
text: I'm prepared!

title: Chickenlover
text: (Hands behind back) For my book report, I read 'The Lion The Witch and the Wardrobe'. It was very very good. Have you read it Mr. Garrison?

title: Chickenlover
text: No, I can't say that I have.

title: Chickenlover
text: (Lighting up) Oh, good! (Happily) In 'The Lion, The Witch and the Wardrobe', a bunch of, uh, hippies walk around and paint stuff. They eat lunch, and then they find a magical... camel, which they have to eat to stay alive. And that's pretty much it, I give it a B minus.

title: Chickenlover
text: And I give you an F, Eric. Now sit down.

title: Chickenlover
text: Aw, DAMMIT!

title: Chickenlover
text: Okay, Officer Barbrady, why don't you give us your book report?

title: Chickenlover
role: Barbrady walks up to the front.

title: Chickenlover
text: I have just finished reading the heart warming novel 'Go Dog Go'. I found it a compelling and disturbing look at the canine psyche'. If I may read a passage:

title: Chickenlover
text: (Reading) Big dog..... Little dog..... A red dog..... On a.....

title: Chickenlover
text: Well, anyway, I don't want to give away the ending, but I will say that it spirals toward an incredible twist turn that parallels my own life.

title: Chickenlover
role: Barbrady heads back to his desk.

title: Chickenlover
text: Thank you, Officer Barbrady, that was a very good book report, indeed. I'll give you an A.

title: Chickenlover
text: Hooray!!

title: Chickenlover
text: (Quietly, to Barbrady) Goodie two-shoes!!

title: Chickenlover
role: PAN along the playground, where all the children are enjoying
text: various activities.

title: Chickenlover
role: SETTLE on the swingset, where Barbrady and Kenny and a little
text: girl are swinging.

title: Chickenlover
text: (Singing) Swingset, swingset up and down I go... Whoosh goes the willy wind blowing through my toes...

title: Chickenlover
role: Stan, Kyle and Cartman stand off to the side, tossing a red
text: ball back and forth.

title: Chickenlover
text: Dude, I think Officer Barbrady enjoys being at school at little too much.

title: Chickenlover
text: Yeah, isn't he just supposed to be learning how to read?

title: Chickenlover
role: Barbrady swings higher on the swingset, higher.

title: Chickenlover
text: SWINGSET! SWINGSET! UP AND DOWN I GOOO!!!!

title: Chickenlover
role: Suddenly, the Mayor and her assistants walk in.

title: Chickenlover
text: OFFICER BARBRADY! WHAT ARE YOU DOING?!

title: Chickenlover
role: Suddenly, Barbrady stops swinging. The force of the sudden
text: stop causes Kenny to fly out of his swing, and smash into a brick wall.

title: Chickenlover
text: Oh, my God! They killed --

title: Chickenlover
role: Kenny gets up and waves it off.

title: Chickenlover
text: Oh, never mind.

title: Chickenlover
text: Well, how's the reading coming along?!

title: Chickenlover
text: Oh, pretty good...

title: Chickenlover
text: Barbrady... We really need you to speed this up. The chickenfucker struck again last night.

title: Chickenlover
text: Oh, no!

title: Chickenlover
text: Oh Mayor please, when we're around children we prefer to call him the Chicken LOVER.

title: Chickenlover
text: This time he made love to Carla Weathers prize chicken. She's catatonic

title: Chickenlover
text: Who, Carla Weathers or the chicken?

title: Chickenlover
text: The perpetrator left this clue at the crime scene.

title: Chickenlover
text: I can't read this, it has silent e's.

title: Chickenlover
role: The Mayor gets in Barbrady's face.

title: Chickenlover
text: You have to learn to read faster, Barbrady!

title: Chickenlover
text: I'm doing the best I can!! I even got an A on my book report!

title: Chickenlover
text: Listen, buddy, either you learn to read QUICK or else I'm going to find a law officer to replace you FOREVER!!

title: Chickenlover
role: The Mayor and her assistants walk off.

title: Chickenlover
role: While leaving, one of the assistants grabs the red ball from
text: the boys and pops it.

title: Chickenlover
text: Hey, What'd ya do that for?

title: Chickenlover
text: Uh, just dramatic effect, sorry.

title: Chickenlover
role: Barbrady looks sad as the other boys gather around him.

title: Chickenlover
text: Oh boy, I am in big trouble... I'll never learn to read fast enough, and the town is in chaos.

title: Chickenlover
text: It's cool dude, we'll help you.

title: Chickenlover
text: Hey, that's right... You CAN help me!! Under Article 39 section 2 of Police code, I am allowed to deputize citizens in a time of crisis.

title: Chickenlover
text: REALLY? I wanna be a cop!

title: Chickenlover
text: You boys will be my deputies, you can help me restore order, catch the chickenlover, and swing me on the swingset.

title: Chickenlover
text: Do I get a nightstick?!

title: Chickenlover
text: Sure, nightsticks for everybody!!

title: Chickenlover
role: Barbrady throws Cartman his night stick.

title: Chickenlover
text: You keep a tab on crime in the city, and we'll try to solve the chickenlover case!

title: Chickenlover
text: 10-4, Sergeant!

title: Chickenlover
text: Now, what did that clue say again?

title: Chickenlover
text: 'If you want to know where I'll strike next, read Bumbly Wumbly And the Spotted Spacecraft'!

title: Chickenlover
text: To the Booktastic bus, deputies! We haven't a moment to spare!

title: Chickenlover
text: Hooray!!

title: Chickenlover
text: Good day good friends! Welcome to the magical world of reading.

title: Chickenlover
text: We need a copy of "Bumbly Wumbly and the Spotted Spacecraft" right away!

title: Chickenlover
text: Ooooow! That's a very magical book, full of wondrous --

title: Chickenlover
text: Aw, just give us the damn book, fruitcake!

title: Chickenlover
role: The driver hands over the book. Barbrady opens it.

title: Chickenlover
text: What's it say?

title: Chickenlover
text: It says 'Mah... Mah...' Uh, what's this word?

title: Chickenlover
text: I.

title: Chickenlover
text: Oh yeah, 'I... Mah... Mah...'

title: Chickenlover
text: Here give me that. (Reading) 'I am Bumbly Wumbly, I live in the pond'.

title: Chickenlover
text: A pond. Hey, maybe that means Stark's Pond.

title: Chickenlover
text: That's quick thinking, deputy! Let's get to Stark's pond immediately!

title: Chickenlover
role: Starsky and Hutch THEME MUSIC kicks in as Cartman comes
text: driving in a BIG-WHEEL cop car.

title: Chickenlover
role: Cartman puts on some shades as he drives down the street,
text: chewing gum and feeling ultra cool.

title: Chickenlover
role: Suddenly, a nice car speeds past him.

title: Chickenlover
text: Hey!

title: Chickenlover
role: Cartman hits the uplights and sirens.

title: Chickenlover
role: The car pulls over. Cartman gets out of the Big wheel, pulls
text: up his pants and approaches the car.

title: Chickenlover
role: He knocks on the window with his billy club. Stan's dad rolls
text: it down.

title: Chickenlover
text: Yes Officer?

title: Chickenlover
text: I clocked you at 40 miles an hour back there. Do you know what the speed limit is here?

title: Chickenlover
text: Well according to that sign right there, it's 40 miles an hour.

title: Chickenlover
role: Sure enough, there is a sign right in front of them that
text: reads 'SPEED LIMIT 40 MILES AN HOUR.'

title: Chickenlover
text: Step out of the car please, sir.

title: Chickenlover
text: (Stepping out) Wait a second, aren't you Stan's little friend?

title: Chickenlover
text: Sir, step out of the car please.

title: Chickenlover
text: Yeah! You're the one who always plugs up the toilet at our house.

title: Chickenlover
text: AY! I'm a COP! And you WILL respect my authority.

title: Chickenlover
text: (laughs) Yeah right! You better get back to school, little boy.

title: Chickenlover
text: GET YOUR ASS TO JAIL!

title: Chickenlover
role: Suddenly, Cartman smacks Stan's Dad in the knee with his
text: nightstick.

title: Chickenlover
text: Ow!!! Hey what the hell are you doing? You can't do that!... Ow!

title: Chickenlover
text: Sweet.

title: Chickenlover
role: Cartman starts beating Stan's dad senseless.

title: Chickenlover
role: A small crowd has gathered around a solitary chicken that
text: looks completely normal and eats feed.

title: Chickenlover
text: Oh weak, dude, we're too late!

title: Chickenlover
text: Well, the chickens don't seem to really mind.

title: Chickenlover
text: Well this is terrible. Now who would have sex with a chicken?

title: Chickenlover
text: I would!

title: Chickenlover
text: You couldn't screw anything, halfie! You don't have any legs!!

title: Chickenlover
text: Oh... yeah.

title: Chickenlover
role: Halfie walks on his arms away. The priest calls after him.

title: Chickenlover
text: Have some respect for people's feelings! Would ya Halfie?

title: Chickenlover
role: Kyle, Stan and Barbrady run up.

title: Chickenlover
text: Come on, dudes, we need to look for another clue.

title: Chickenlover
role: Kyle starts searching the ground. Stan follows.

title: Chickenlover
text: Here! Here!! I found one!

title: Chickenlover
text: What's it say? What's it say?!!!

title: Chickenlover
text: It says read 'Teetle the Timid Taxa... Taxa..' the Taxi... What's this word?

title: Chickenlover
text: I don't know.

title: Chickenlover
text: (struggling to read) 'T...Ta....Ta... TAXIDERMIST!!

title: Chickenlover
role: Everyone gasps. TRIUMPHANT MUSIC blows, Barbrady looks
text: extremely proud of himself. A few townspeople applaud.

title: Chickenlover
text: I read it! I read it all by myself!

title: Chickenlover
role: Video style footage of Cartman on his Big Wheel.

title: Chickenlover
role: *NOTE - All of the following scene should parody COPS.

title: Chickenlover
text: Yeah, I've been working this beat for about three days now... You definitely have to have pretty thick skin, or else these people they just walk all over you. Sometimes you have to go undercover to get the worst of 'em.

title: Chickenlover
role: Cartman is standing in the street, still in COP gear, but
text: with a pink skirt around his waist.

title: Chickenlover
role: He is walking up and down the street pretending to be a
text: hooker. A title comes up 'Prostitution Sting 9:42 p.m. westside.'.

title: Chickenlover
role: Finally a car comes pulling up.

title: Chickenlover
text: Hi there, little lady.

title: Chickenlover
text: Well hi there. What are you doing tonight?

title: Chickenlover
text: Well, hopefully spending some time with you, gorgeous. Is twenty dollars enough?

title: Chickenlover
text: Sir, step out of the car please.

title: Chickenlover
text: What? Oh oh, is this a bust?

title: Chickenlover
text: Sir, step out of the car.

title: Chickenlover
text: Hey wait a minute... You're just a KID!

title: Chickenlover
text: Maybe THIS will teach you to listen to AUTHORITY!!!

title: Chickenlover
role: Cartman smacks the guy in the shins.

title: Chickenlover
text: OWWWW!!!... Owwww. Hey man, what are you doing? Owww, stop it.

title: Chickenlover
role: Cartman's back on his big wheel.

title: Chickenlover
text: (To camera) Yeah, sometimes upholding the law is messy. But you get by...

title: Chickenlover
text: ...One day at a time.

title: Chickenlover
text: I got a TV. Shhhh come on.

title: Chickenlover
role: Barbrady is alone at a large desk with a huge book in front
text: of him.

title: Chickenlover
text: (Reading) Teetle the timid Taxidermist... Loves to... (to himself) Oh, God damn reading is lame!

title: Chickenlover
text: How's it going, dude?

title: Chickenlover
text: Terrible. I give up. I'm not fit to be a cop!!

title: Chickenlover
text: Come on dude, it's not that hard!

title: Chickenlover
text: IT IS TOO!!

title: Chickenlover
text: Just read the sentence.

title: Chickenlover
text: Teetle the Timid taxidermist, loves to go to the pet -- pet --

title: Chickenlover
text: Come on, dumbass, you can do it!

title: Chickenlover
text: Pet... Wait a minute...

title: Chickenlover
role: A flashback balloon of Mr. Garrison pops up.

title: Chickenlover
text: Conjugate the verb... Conjugate the verb.

title: Chickenlover
text: Yes, conjucate the verb.

title: Chickenlover
text: PetTING. PETTING ZOO. He loves to go to the petting zoo!! Boys! We're off!!

title: Chickenlover
role: Cartman is driving his big wheel down the street. (Everything
text: is shot from a 'passenger' seat POV)

title: Chickenlover
role: A small TITLE reads "Dep. Eric Cartman Street Patrol".

title: Chickenlover
role: Suddenly, a crackling comes over the radio.

title: Chickenlover
text: All units, all units 512 at 635 Avenue De Los Mexicanos, request assistance...

title: Chickenlover
role: Cartman hits his lights and drives faster down the street.

title: Chickenlover
role: Now the TITLE changes to 'Domestic Disturbance 4:38 pm Lower
text: East Side'.

title: Chickenlover
role: Cartman walks up to the door and knocks on it with his
text: nightstick.

title: Chickenlover
role: The door opens to reveal Kenny's father.

title: Chickenlover
text: Sir, could you step out of the car please?

title: Chickenlover
text: We're fine, officer.

title: Chickenlover
role: The video camera ZOOMS IN to reveal that Kenny's Dad has a
text: black eye.

title: Chickenlover
text: And, uh, who, who's in here with you?

title: Chickenlover
text: Just me and my wife and my brother, and my wife's cousin and his son and my brother's girlfriend and our two kids --

title: Chickenlover
role: Kenny and his brother appear in the doorway.

title: Chickenlover
text: Mrph mrmmh mremm.

title: Chickenlover
text: -- and my brother's girlfriend's mother and this guy Bob who I met last year.

title: Chickenlover
text: (To camera) Poor people tend to live in clusters.

title: Chickenlover
text: What, what did you say?

title: Chickenlover
text: Nothing. Now, sir, is there some kind of --

title: Chickenlover
role: Suddenly, Kenny's mom appears in the doorway.

title: Chickenlover
text: I WANT HIM OUT OF MY HOUSE! HE AIN'T WORTH A (BEEP) HE CAN'T EVEN HOLD A (BEEEP) JOB!!

title: Chickenlover
text: SHUT UP, BITCH!

title: Chickenlover
text: Okay, let's try to watch the language. There's children present here.

title: Chickenlover
text: YOU LAZY ASS MOTHER(BEEEP)!

title: Chickenlover
text: LOOK WHAT SHE DID TO MY (BEEEP)ING EYE!!!

title: Chickenlover
text: I'LL DO IT AGAIN!

title: Chickenlover
role: Kenny's mom smacks his dad in the eye. Kenny laughs his ass
text: off.

title: Chickenlover
text: Mom hit dad again.

title: Chickenlover
text: (To camera) Now, the first thing to do in domestic disturbance calls like this one is to just calm everybody down. (To parents) RESPECT MY AUTHORITY!!!

title: Chickenlover
role: Cartman hauls off and starts beating the crap out of both of
text: them. Kenny's mother and father YELL and SCREAM as they get pummeled IN THE SHINS with Cartman's vengeful stick.

title: Chickenlover
role: Kenny and his brother laughs hysterically.

title: Chickenlover
role: Just then, a voice blasts over Cartman's radio.

title: Chickenlover
text: ALL UNITS! ALL UNITS!! WE HAVE A 5- 20 ON THE SUSPECT! REPORT TO THE SOUTH PARK PETTING ZOO IMMEDIATELY!!

title: Chickenlover
text: (To himself) Chickenlover...

title: Chickenlover
role: PAN along the animals, all of which are being petted by
text: children, who all look completely bored.

title: Chickenlover
role: The Pan SETTLES on a chicken, which looks scared, and is
text: surrounded by Barbrady, Stan and Kyle who are all trying to protect it.

title: Chickenlover
text: Keep your eyes peeled, boys. Somebody's going to make love to this chicken any minute...

title: Chickenlover
text: Maybe we were wrong about the clue.

title: Chickenlover
text: Yeah, maybe you read it wrong.

title: Chickenlover
text: Oh, no...

title: Chickenlover
role: But just then, a loud rustling is heard.

title: Chickenlover
text: Shh!

title: Chickenlover
role: All is quiet... Barbrady and the boys look around carefully.
text: Behind them, a hand reaches out and grabs the chicken!!

title: Chickenlover
text: BA-GWAKK!!

title: Chickenlover
text: Keep your eyes peeled!

title: Chickenlover
text: LOOK!!

title: Chickenlover
role: Stan turns to the bush, where rustling is going on.

title: Chickenlover
text: HE'S HERE!!

title: Chickenlover
text: GRAB HIM!!

title: Chickenlover
role: Cartman races down the street, with lights and sirens blaring.

title: Chickenlover
text: DAMMIT! Can't this thing go any faster?!?!

title: Chickenlover
role: Barbrady emerges from the bushes with the chickenfucker in
text: hand. He is wearing an obvious Richard Nixon mask on his face, and has a small gun in his hand.

title: Chickenlover
role: The suspect spins around and pushes Barbrady away. He fires
text: his gun, but Barbrady dodges it, and the bullet hits Kenny.

title: Chickenlover
text: Oh my God! They've killed --

title: Chickenlover
role: But again, Kenny gets up. He looks at his hand which has
text: been shot, but appears fine.

title: Chickenlover
text: God dammit!

title: Chickenlover
role: Barbrady finally gets a hold of the suspect and subdues him.

title: Chickenlover
text: I knew it was you all along, Richard Nixon!!

title: Chickenlover
text: Uhh... I think that's a mask, dude.

title: Chickenlover
text: Oh.

title: Chickenlover
role: Barbrady rips off the mask to reveal --

title: Chickenlover
text: Woa dude! It's the bookmobile driver!!

title: Chickenlover
text: Caught you red handed!!

title: Chickenlover
text: Indeed you did!! How did you know I would strike here?

title: Chickenlover
text: By reading Teetle the Timid Taxidermist!

title: Chickenlover
text: YOU DID?! REALLY?! THEN IT WORKED!! MY WHOLE PLAN WORKED ABSOLUTELY PERFECTLY!!!

title: Chickenlover
text: What are you talking about dude?

title: Chickenlover
text: When I heard that Officer Barbrady couldn't read, I knew I had to motivate him somehow! So I formulated a plan to encourage him to learn the magic of reading!!

title: Chickenlover
text: So you fucked a bunch of chickens?

title: Chickenlover
text: YES! YES! EXACTLY!!! Don't you see, only by fucking chickens could I get Officer Barbrady to become literate!

title: Chickenlover
role: Everyone thinks, and tries to make this make sense.

title: Chickenlover
text: That doesn't make a whole lot of sense dude.

title: Chickenlover
text: Oh no? He who was blind can now see! I got Officer Barbrady to read. My plan worked perfectly!!!

title: Chickenlover
role: Stan and Kyle look at each other, absolutely baffled.

title: Chickenlover
text: Well... I guess I should say thanks?

title: Chickenlover
text: You're welcome. And now, my reading friend, you've proven that you are ready for the big time. I give you this hardback copy of 'Atlas Shrugged' by Ayn Rand.

title: Chickenlover
role: The driver hands Barbrady the book.

title: Chickenlover
text: FREEZE! Put your hands in the air!!

title: Chickenlover
text: Cartman!

title: Chickenlover
role: They look over. Cartman is there holding up his mighty
text: nightstick.

title: Chickenlover
text: I got reports that the suspect is in this area.

title: Chickenlover
text: Well, he is... It turns out that the bookmobile driver here was the one making love to chickens.

title: Chickenlover
text: Ah-HA!!

title: Chickenlover
role: Cartman walks over and starts beating the bookmobile driver
text: in the shins relentlessly.

title: Chickenlover
text: AAGHAGH!! That hurts!!

title: Chickenlover
text: Woa, dude!

title: Chickenlover
text: Cartman!

title: Chickenlover
role: Barbrady rushes over and picks Cartman up.

title: Chickenlover
text: No, no! That's not how you uphold the law!

title: Chickenlover
text: But he is not listening to my AUTHORITY!!

title: Chickenlover
text: Oh, oh, you've got it all wrong my little friend. You do it like this --

title: Chickenlover
role: Barbrady whips around and starts beating the chickenfucker
text: in the head with his stick.

title: Chickenlover
text: You got to get them in the head, they go down quicker.

title: Chickenlover
role: The chickenfucker falls to the ground unconscious.

title: Chickenlover
text: Ohhh...

title: Chickenlover
text: I guess you should leave police work to the professionals, huh Cartman?

title: Chickenlover
text: Well, anyway, I'm relieving you of your duties. I've proved that I can read and now I'm BACK ON THE JOB!!

title: Chickenlover
text: Hooray!!

title: Chickenlover
text: Hey, so what are you going to do now?

title: Chickenlover
text: (Stopping) Now?

title: Chickenlover
text: Well, I... I think I'll get in the bathtub, and then curl up with a good book!

title: Chickenlover
role: Triumphant MUSIC plays as Barbrady gives a happy thumbs up.
text: FREEZE FRAME on Barbrady while the music plays for quite a while.

title: Chickenlover
role: CUT BACK to the kids, who are all standing there, blinking
text: with confusion.

title: Chickenlover
role: CUT BACK to Barbrady, who is still in a freeze frame, with
text: his thumb in the air, and music playing.

title: Chickenlover
role: CUT BACK to the kids who look to one another, and finally
text: shrug and walk away.

title: Chickenlover
text: And so today, South Park held a parade to honor Officer Barbrady, and his heroic work on the Chickenfucker case.

title: Chickenlover
role: A parade is in progress for Barbrady. The crowd cheers him
text: on.

title: Chickenlover
text: Thank you everybody! Thank you!

title: Chickenlover
text: Speech! Speech!

title: Chickenlover
role: The crowd quiets in anticipation of a speech.

title: Chickenlover
text: What?

title: Chickenlover
text: They want you to give a speech Officer Barbrady, about the whole experience over the last couple of days.

title: Chickenlover
text: Oh. Okay... (to the crowd) Well, first of all I'd like to thank the town of South Park, the town that borne me and eventually will rob me of my life precious.

title: Chickenlover
text: Second, I'd like to say to all those out there who think they can screw chickens just to teach people to read... Your days are numbered!!!

title: Chickenlover
text: And finally, I'd like to say that READING TOTALLY SUCKS ASS!!

title: Chickenlover
text: Hurray.

title: Chickenlover
text: Yes, at first, I was happy to be learning how to read. It seemed exciting and magical. But then I read this --

title: Chickenlover
role: Barbrady holds up a copy of ATLAS SHRUGGED, by Ayn Rand. All
text: 1085 pages of it.

title: Chickenlover
text: Atlas Shrugged, by Ayn Rand. I read every last word of this garbage and because of this piece of SHIT, I'm never reading again!

title: Chickenlover
text: Hurrah for Barbrady!!!

title: Chickenlover
text: Wow, I guess reading really does suck ass.

title: Chickenlover
text: Hey, that's what I've been saying all along, you guys.

title: Chickenlover
text: I'm just glad everything turned out okay and Barbrady got his job back.

title: Chickenlover
text: It's poetic justice.

title: Chickenlover
role: Barbrady looks down with a smile.

title: Chickenlover
text: Thanks boys.

title: Chickenlover
role: He gives them a thumbs up. FREEZE-FRAME and play survivor
text: music.

title: Chickenlover
role: A big tree falls over on top of Kenny, killing him.
